mapper.sql: grade_id, gender, scale_id, w_id, m, sd
mapper.select: select * from scale_norm where scale_id =#{scaleid} and norm_id=#{normid}
mapper.delete: delete from scale_norm where norm_id=#{normid} and scale_id=#{scaleid}
mapper.insert: insert into scale_norm (grade_id, gender, scale_id, w_id, m, sd) values (#{gradeOrderId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{scaleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{m,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sd,jdbcType=REAL})

insert into scale_norm
grade_id,
gender,
scale_id,
w_id,
m,
sd,
#{gradeOrderId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{scaleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{m,jdbcType=REAL},
#{sd,jdbcType=REAL},
mapper.update: update scale_norm set norm_id=#{normid} where scale_id=#{scaleid} and type=#{type}
update scale_norm set norm_id=#{normid} where scale_id=#{scaleid} and type=#{type} and userid=#{userid} and norm_id is null
update scale_norm set norm_id=#{normid} where (scale_id=#{scaleid_s} or scale_id=#{scaleid_p} or scale_id=#{scaleid_t} ) and type=#{type} and userid=#{userid} and norm_id is null
